panels.description:
This panel requires the Harvest REST collector and an ONTAP 9.10+ cluster with autonomous ransomware protection enabled.
See Enable ARP for more details
.

panels.description: Number of SAML authentication.

targets.expr:
count(
    count by (datacenter, cluster) (
      security_account_samluser{cluster=~"$Cluster",datacenter=~"$Datacenter"} > 0
    )
  )
or
  vector(0)

panels.title: SAML

panels.description: Number of AD & LDAP authentication.
panels.title: AD/LDAP

panels.description: Number of certificate authentication.

targets.expr:
count(
    count by (datacenter, cluster) (
      security_account_certificateuser{cluster=~"$Cluster",datacenter=~"$Datacenter"} > 0
    )
  )
or
  vector(0)

panels.title: Certificate

panels.description: Number of password authentication.

targets.expr:
count(
    count by (datacenter, cluster) (
      security_account_localuser{cluster=~"$Cluster",datacenter=~"$Datacenter"} > 0
    )
  )
or
  vector(0)

panels.description: Volume encryption & anti-ransomware status.
panels.title: Volume Encryption & Anti-ransomware Status

panels.description: Detail of anti-ransomware snapshot.
panels.title: Anti-ransomware Snapshots

panels.description:
❌  means this attribute is non-compliant. 

|  Column  | Compliant When  |  
|---|---|
| `Snapshot Policy` | All volumes have applied Snapshot policy |  
| `Snapshot Autodelete` | All volumes have enabled Snapshot autodelete |
| `ARW Protection for SVMs` | All SVMs have enabled ARW protection |
|`ARW Protection for Volumes`| All volumes have enabled ARW protection|
| `Cluster Certificate Validity` | Cluster has active certificate(s) |
| `Global FIPS`| Cluster has global FIPS enabled |
| `Telnet` | Cluster has telnet disabled |
| `Autosupport Https Transport` | Cluster uses HTTPS for autosupport |
| `Default Admin User` | Default admin user is locked |
| `Remote Shell` | Cluster's remote shell is disabled |
| `MD5 in use` | Cluster does not use MD5 algorithm |
| `Insecure SSH Settings` | Cluster has strong SSH server ciphers |
| `Login Banner` | Cluster has enabled login banner |
| `Log Forwarding Encrypted` | Cluster has encrypted protocol for log forwarding |
| `Network Time Protocol` | Cluster has configured three NTP servers |
| `Cluster Peering` | Cluster peers use encryption |
| `Notification Configured` | Cluster has configured destinations for notifications |
| `Automatic Updates Configured`| Cluster has enabled automatic updates |.
panels.title: Cluster Compliance

panels.description: ❌  means this attribute is non-compliant.
panels.title: SVM Compliance

list.description: Displaying only the data SVMs and omitting root SVMs
